text: @HolmeRiver @EnvAgencyYNE @treesponsibilit It's brilliant news! Looking forward to being part of it 🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳🌳

We couldn't have done any of this without the generous support of our funders @EnvAgency @HeritageFundNOR @YorkshireWater and @CravenCouncil. Their support has helped improve people's wellbeing during this challenging year and make our river a great place to live and work by.

2020 has been a big year for our Trust. Together with our partner @EnvAgency we've been hard at work reconnecting 60km of the river through our #DNAire project. @EnvAgencyYNE @Suttle_Projects and @FishtekConsult have worked hard to be on course for delivering new four fish passes https://t.co/mlB9IcTWjs
